title: FS: T206 Bill Hallman PSA 5 SOLD
author: freakhappy

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Bill Hallman PSA 5 SOLD
posts.post_content:
SOLD SOLD SOLD Up for consideration is a T206 Bill Hallman PSA 5.  Very nice card and with great color.  Only thing is it has a tiny bit of chipping on the upper left corner.  Still merits the grade it was given.  
Paypal Gift/Owed or Money Order

PM or email (Cavelyon@aol.com)
